question:
Consider the following statements about Mission Innovation (MI):
  1. It is a global initiative of 22 countries and the European Union
  2. It aims at accelerating the clean energy revolution
  3. It encourages greater participation of private sector in transforming clean energy
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: <u>First statement is correct</u>. Mission Innovation is a global initiative of 22 countries and the European Union. <u>Second statement is also correct</u>. The mission aims at accelerating the clean energy revolution. <u>Third statement is correct</u>. Mission Innovation encourages greater participation of private sector in transforming clean energy. The Department of Biotechnology (DBT) has been identified as the nodal agency to coordinate national efforts in clean energy for Mission Innovation activities on behalf of Government of India. DST, Ministry of Power and MNRE are other ministries participating in addressing the challenges.
